short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension panel assisting research & scholarship at WIU Libraries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WIU Libraries has created the Research Panel to give you quick access to library resources and services wherever you are on the web. Downloading the panel gives you one-click access to:

    • Full-text articles and e-journals
    • World-class library research databases
    • Assistance from reference librarian pros
    • WIU's WestCat & other library catalogs
    • ILLiad (Interlibrary Loan)
    • Google and Google Scholar for WIU!
    • ...and more!
